item.title: (Hu)go Template Primer
item.description: My first action release! :) :) :) :) :) :) https://github.com/denzalman/hugo-build-action/releases/tag/v0.2 Hugo uses the excellent Go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic. In our experience that it is just the right amount of logic to be able to create a good static website.
